title: Mouse ends up on top left hand corner of screen

replies.body: yes i have this problem, it literally just happened once my game finished, and i cant click anything, I was forced to shut down cause of that shit. really annoying

Found a solution, well it worked for me at least.

You can ctrl + alt + delete and then from there open task manager and shut down the league client/ingame client application and that worked for me :)

Could you perhaps give a few more details? Is your cursor stuck there? Can you move it normally but when you stop moving it bounces back? Did you sticky tape your mouse to the top right hand corner of your screen but it was offended by that and moved over to the left?

You really haven't given us much to work with, so we'll need a bit more to help you troubleshoot.

haha fair point. Sometimes when i finish my games on the end screen page 'victory/defeat' my cursor suddenly goes to the top left hand side of the screen. The reason i say sometimes as its not consistently happening. Is there a reason for this or? Like even when I would alt tab out to my desktop it'd still be stuck there.

It's a new on to me, but I'll find someone more versed in obscure technical issues to help you out :P

Just a few things to clarify:
- So it gets stuck there and you can't move it, even if you close/tab out of the game?
- Do you have any kind of mouse software installed (e.g Razer Synapse)?
- PC or Mac?
- Have you noticed any other programs you have open specifically when the issue happens?

i can alt tab out to see my desktop but it spazzes in the corner of the screen .

I dont have a mouse software 

Using a windows 10 PC

I usually only have chrome and spotify opened while playing league.
Ok so I've been told to recommend switching to borderless mode (it sounds like you're in standard fullscreen?) as it might fix your issue. Past that I'll keep hunting stuff down for you.
